Preference.android:title: See docs for more info on these settings

SwitchPreferenceCompat.android:summary: When enabled, the client uses custom DNS servers to resolve internal resources and aliases. This overrides your system's default DNS settings. Queries that cannot be resolved as a Pangolin resource will be forwarded to your configured Upstream DNS Server.
SwitchPreferenceCompat.android:title: Enable Aliases (DNS Override)

SwitchPreferenceCompat.android:summary: When enabled, DNS queries are routed through the tunnel for remote resolution. To ensure queries are tunneled correctly, you must define the DNS server as a Pangolin resource and enter its address as an Upstream DNS Server.
SwitchPreferenceCompat.android:title: DNS Over Tunnel

SwitchPreferenceCompat.android:summary: When enabled, tunnel logs are saved to a file that can be downloaded for troubleshooting.
SwitchPreferenceCompat.android:title: Enable Log Collection
